ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if EffectDC() ~= nil then local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:GuidedReveal( ZONE_GRAVEYARD , ZONE_LIBRARY ) target:PutOnTopOfLibrary() end end
